entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
